name: @jaysalvat/x-app
description: Smart in-place JS templating engine for micro-apps.
author: Jay Salvat

scripts.version:patch: npm version patch -m 'Bump to patch v%s'
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor -m 'Bump to minor v%s'
scripts.version:major: npm version major -m 'Bump to major v%s'
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -m 'Release patch v%s' && npm publish --access=public
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor -m 'Release minor v%s' && npm publish --access=public
scripts.release:major: npm version major -m 'Release major v%s' && npm publish --access=public
